entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:25 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 11.
